title: Mini-Ep 213: How To Do Nothing
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 213: How To Do Nothing
itunes:subtitle: Kate’s journal arrives and it’s not what she expected, and Doree continues to explore her personal organization workflow. Then listeners ask about grey eyebrow hair, facial sponges, and hot tips for sunburns. Plus, a listener challenges Kate and Doree ...
description:
Kate’s journal arrives and it’s not what she expected, and Doree continues to explore her personal organization workflow. Then listeners ask about grey eyebrow hair, facial sponges, and hot tips for sunburns. Plus, a listener challenges Kate and Doree to a cooking challenge.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
  • Worth The Wait Event info!
